ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.treesearch

Class SplitWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.treesearch.SplitWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    final class SplitWorker
extends java.lang.Thread
    Performs the category utility calculation for a fraction of all combination id's.

      • maxPossibleCU

        private final double maxPossibleCU
        The theoretical maximal possible category utility value for a merge.

      • maxCUFound

        private static boolean maxCUFound
        Indicates whether in the current cycle a merge with the maximal possible category utility was found. Search is terminated if true.
        All SplitWorker threads read and write to this variable, however no synchronization is needed, since write sets variable always only to true. Additional cycles due to delayed update of the variable in memory do not harm.
        After each cycle variable is reset to false.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SplitWorker

        Instantiates a new SplitWorker that can be started in a new thread.
        Parameters:
        split - combination'ids to calculate
        searcher - searcher that calculates category utility.
        clusterSet - set to cluster

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Calculates all the category utilities for the combination id's on the split or until maxCUFound is true.
        Specified by:

      • setMaxCUFound

        protected static void setMaxCUFound(boolean maxCUFound)
        Sets maxCUFound. Needed to reset static variable to false upon the completion of a clustering cycle.
        Parameters:
        maxCUFound - new value
